short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your cam as a mirror or create emotional collages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Use your webcam or the camera of your mobile as a mirror
- Create snapshots of the mirrored image of your webcam
- Record video from your webcam and save it to your device
- Browse your computer for a picture and use it as a snapshot
- Make faces and create a collage with the emojicam
- Apply different effects and filters to the snapshots or directly to the webcam stream
- Add funny layers: hats, mustaches, animal figures etc.
- Resize and rotate your overlays, optionally add shadow to them
- Add frames to your creation

... and save them on your device or upload them to your facebook album and optionally share them on your wall

Lots of customizable color filters and effects:
- gray filter
- hue / saturation
- sepia
- invert
- negative
- RGB splitter
- brightness
- contrast
- blur
- bloom
- and more...

Have fun!
